title: Bloomberg Markets: Barinka on Blue Apron IPO Pitch
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Barinka on Blue Apron IPO Pitch
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alex Barinka IPO Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing meal-kit delivery company Blue Apron Holdings Inc. marketing 30 million shares of Class A common stock at $15 to $17 each in its initial public offering, aiming to raise as much as $510 million, according to a regulatory filing Monday. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
